STATE v. SIZEMORE. No. COA06-823. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed February 6, 2007. Certification Date February 26, 2007. Appeal from the Henderson (05CRS2240, 05CRS2241, 05CRS2242, 05CRS2243, 05CRS2244, 05CRS2245, 05CRS2246, 05CRS2247, 05CRS2248, 05CRS2249, 05CRS2250, 05CRS2251).

Case Reported Without Published Opinion. No error.
